com.interface21.aop.framework
Interface MethodPointcut

All Known Implementing Classes:
AlwaysInvoked
public interface MethodPointcut

Interface to be implemented by objects that can cause conditional invocation of an Interceptor depending on the method, arguments and attributes passed.

Since:
03-Apr-2003
Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
Author:
Rod Johnson

getInterceptor

public org.aopalliance.MethodInterceptor getInterceptor()
Return the interceptor to run conditionally

MethodInterceptor

applies

public boolean applies(java.lang.reflect.Method m,
                       java.lang.Object[] args,
                       org.aopalliance.AttributeRegistry attributeRegistry)
Should the interceptor be invoked? This method is invoked before any interceptors have been invoked.
Parameters:
m - method being invoked
args - arguments to the method
attributeRegistry - registry of attributes. Some implementations may wish to decide whether their interceptor should be invoked based on the value of this object.
Returns:
boolean whether the interceptor referenced by this object should be invoked
